BackstoryDef.title: Shelter Repairman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] performed menial, unskilled labor in the shelter. [PAWN_possessive]'s job also required tending to the brahmen that transported goods.

BackstoryDef.title: Psycho from Shelter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of his [PAWN_possessive] adult life in the vault. [PAWN_possessive]'s vault medic had little understanding of mental illness, and [PAWN_pronoun] was treated more like an animal than a human.\n\nAlthough [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually exiled, [PAWN_possessive]'s experience left many of [PAWN_possessive]'s basic life skills weakened.

BackstoryDef.title: human computer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] proved to have an excellent memory and the ability to perform complex calculations in his head [PAWN_possessive]. The vault overseer decided to hire [PAWN_nameDef] to monitor the vault's finances and expenses [PAWN_possessive].

BackstoryDef.title: Shelter sheriff
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the vault's peace officer. [PAWN_pronoun] handled petty crime, dispute resolution, and the occasional drunken shootout in the mess hall.

BackstoryDef.title: Entrepreneur from Shelter
BackstoryDef.description: The world's resources are the most important concern. But someone has to manage the caravans.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] has mastered the skills of trade - bribery and technical analysis. [PAWN_pronoun] is a socio-intellectual machine.
